file_content.text: Well, hey there, kid! Been a while now, I barely even recognized you.
Give it up, Gearbox--it's over.
Surrender!
Over? No, no, we're just getting started here, kid.
I don't remember giving you my frequency.
How did you call me?
Well, when you've been around as long as me, you tend to learn a few tricks, kid.
Memory loss is common for people your age.
You're old, no surprise there.
Hah! Calling me old, yeah, I've never heard that before--especially from someone I ended up killing a few seconds later.
And who's that nice young lady you've got with you, there? I don't think I've had the pleasure.
Just back off, Gearbox.
And you never will.
Elara, this is Bex Kolos, a dear old friend.
Fine, I'll introduce you.
Charmed.
Oh, likewise, likewise! You're keeping fine company these days, kid, let me just say.
And is that... Jorman? Gorban? Something like that, right? Well, you must have been pretty desperate to drag that worthless pile all the way from Ord Mantell.
His name is Sergeant Jorgan--Havoc Squad.
Back off, Gearbox.
Oh, pardon me, Sergeant, sir! Officer on deck! An officer with a lower rank than I remember... hm.
Jorgan, you remember our old pal Gearbox?
Ah, just like old times.
Oh, yeah, how could I forget such a charming old man?
So. Stole our war droid, did you? All of that R & D time for nothing--what a waste.
Forex is an exemplary soldier for the Republic.
Not a waste at all.
I might let Forex handle you all on his own. He doesn't much care for traitors.
Try to enjoy the irony.
I would be honored to deliver Gearbox's remains to a court martial. Hopefully, they will still be recognizable as such.
Don't get your little hopes up, Forex. There won't be any court martial for me.
You're just wasting time.
I'm going to feel bad taking you down, Gearbox. It's like gunning down... well, like gunning down anything old and decrepit. Not really sporting.
What are you going to do, shoot my hologram? That'd really show me.
It's rude not to introduce your friends, kid. Didn't anyone teach you any manners?
Listen to me, young lady--never go around with a man who won't introduce you. Means you aren't important to him.
The lieutenant simply knows that I have no interest in conversing with traitors to the Republic.
Well, honey, judging by your accent and the company you're keeping, I'd say that's something of a double standard.
Clearly, this man is too senile to recall why he contacted us. We need to track him down before he expires and robs us of the pleasure of destroying him.
I'll be with you soon enough, don't worry about that.
So, welcome to my humble little research bunker. Have you had a pleasant stay so far?
Jek Kardan and Fuse already surrendered--now it's your turn.
This is over, Gearbox.
Yeah, I'm sure the Emperor himself will be calling soon to talk terms. Give me a break.
Kardan already surrendered--you should follow his example.
This is over, Gearbox.
Jek Kardan is a warrior. He'd never surrender to a worthless whelp like you.
I already got Fuse to surrender--just give it up.
This is over, Gearbox.
Sorry, kid, not buying it. Fuse was no quitter--he'd never surrender just because you showed up.
This is over, Gearbox.
You think I'm stupid, kid? I'm not falling for that regulation talk-the-opponent-down junk, so don't bother.
I'm not sure about your guards, but I've been having a great time.
Very pleasant, yes.
That's no problem. Guards can be replaced--especially guards who can't even do their jobs.
Quit stalling.
Ah, the impatience of youth--as annoying and worthless as ever.
I've got to hand it to you--I didn't think anybody could breach this place, but here you are.
Still, you aren't real Havoc Squad material. See, a real Havoc trooper would never have strolled right into a trap like this one.
Havoc Squad, displace!
Take cover!
Understood, sir!
Right away, sir!
Evasive maneuvering engaged!
A real Havoc trooper would never betray the Republic.
At least I'm not a traitor.
Tavus told you, kid--the Republic betrayed us, not the other way around. Their loss, really.
You've been busy, haven't you?
Impressive.
It helps to be passionate about your work.
Couldn't win in a fair fight, huh, old man?
Fight me yourself, coward!
No such thing as a fair fight.
Welcome to the future of war, kid! Hope you're ready to make history, because you're going to be this baby's first confirmed kill!
I came to kill, not to talk.
